name: RABUSO COMUNICACION
goal:
RABUSO is a specialized company in servicies to professional groups and business associations.

We follow the Association Management Company model, and commitment, trust and professionalism are our core values.

Our team of experts offers their know-how, expertise and skills to business associates and professionals with one clear vision in mind: the success of your business. We provide the utmost quality in management services for the professionals we work with building value-based relationships.

We target our customers' goals so that their business grow and prosper. We are dedicated to fulfilling our clientsâ€™ objectives all the while producing an enhanced bottom line.
interests: Budget, Business and Industry, Communication, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Environment, Trade
